overview: Loser Vitaliy, flies out with another part-time job and turns out to be ‘at the bottom’ in the literal sense. However, it is at this moment that fate gives him a chance — he finds a valid security officer’s certificate, moreover, he even looks like the person in the photo. Life begins to play with new wondrous colors, but not all the rules of society apply to the universe.
title: Lucky Charm
